mapper.select: SELECT A.user_id userId, A.nm unm, A.email, A.role, A.pic, A.birth, A.phone, A.address, A.detail_addr detailAddr , B.class_id classId, B.grade, B.class van, C.school_id schoolId, C.nm schnm FROM user A INNER JOIN van B ON B.class_id = A.class_id INNER JOIN school C ON C.school_id = B.school_id WHERE user_id = #{userId}
